pr_title: [aws-api] Fix JsonParseException when parsing null path in Error object

timeline.message: Fix JsonParseException when parsing null path in Error object

timeline.bodyText: Out of curiosity, you did observe this in a real world AppSync response, in the field? Should we file a bug and ask them to not send null-valued fields?
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@
+{
+  "data": {
+    "listTodos": null
+  },
+  "errors": [
+    {
+      "path": null,
+      "data": null,
+      "errorType": null,
+      "errorInfo": null,
+      "locations": null,

replies.bodyText:
I did observe "path" : null in a response I got a few days ago.  Unfortunately I can't remember now exactly what that error was.
I suppose it would be better to just not include null-valued fields, though I don't think the GraphQL spec is explicit one way or the other.  Regardless though, the client should ignore null-valued fields, not throw an exception, which is what was happening.
replies.author: richardmcclellan
